sentence.text: The genetic testing revealed a de novo heterozygous mutation of c.2452G > A (p.Glu818Lys) in the cellular sodium ion homeostasis gene, which was compatible with the clinical phenotype of CAPOS (cerebellar ataxia, areflexia, maturation of LSU-rRNA from tricistronic rRNA transcript (SSU-rRNA, 5.8S rRNA, LSU-rRNA) cavus, optic atrophy, and sensorineural hearing loss)/CAOS syndrome.

entity.text: maturation of LSU-rRNA from tricistronic rRNA transcript (SSU-rRNA, 5.8S rRNA, LSU-rRNA)
